{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.15187v1", "title": "Method for simulating open-system dynamics using mid-circuit
  measurements on a quantum computer", "summary": "We present a method for simulating the dynamics of an open electronic system
on a quantum computer. This approach entails mid-circuit measurements and
resets to simulate the addition or removal of fermions from the system and
provides a way to apply non-reversible operations to a quantum computer. Using
this method, we simulate the dynamics of an open electronic system consisting
of a fermionic chain positioned between two conductive leads on the
$ibm\_torino$ quantum computer.", "main_category": "quant-ph", "categories": "quant-ph", "published": "2025-04-21T15:57:02Z"}
